summary:
Exploration geologist with over 40 years of professional experience of which 34 years in international oil and gas exploration and production. Recently retired but still interested in short-term consultancy and lecturing opportunities (also for non-profit organizations).

Mastery skills in 2D/3D seismic interpretation, regional geological evaluation and prospect evaluation including risks and volumetrics. Expert in Southern Permian Basin regional geology, and in-depth experience in Unconventional Gas opportunity screening, and shale-gas and CBM exploration project execution. Coaching and developing skills of (junior) geology staff.
